title: Giraffe's Rainy Day: Classic Poems About Weather
description: Giraffe yearns for the rain, but when it pours all night it reminds him of why he loves the sun. A collection of classic poems about weather accompanied by illustrations of a little giraffe's rainy night. This is a story meant to be read aloud to children, to expose them to classic poetry and create a conversation about what it means.
author: Kelleen Silveira
